metadata.title: CVE-2016-9152 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in ecrire/exec/plonger.php in SPIP3.1.3 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML viathe rac parameter.

criterions.comment: spip: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
